abstract: The European Commission has set a Sept. 3 deadline to decide whether or not to clear the planned $5.6 billion merger of Oracle and Sun Microsystems, MarketWatch reported.
snippet: The European Commission has set a Sept. 3 deadline to decide whether or not to clear the planned $5.6 billion merger of Oracle and Sun Microsystems, MarketWatch reported.
lead_paragraph: The European Commission has set a Sept. 3 deadline to decide whether or not to clear the planned $5.6 billion merger of Oracle and Sun Microsystems, MarketWatch reported.

headline.main: E.U. Said to Set Deadline for Oracle-Sun Decision
